# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(XoX LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(XoX "" XoX/src/XoX.ixx XoX/src/Delegata.ixx XoX/src/Memory.ixx XoX/src/Memory/SPool.ixx XoX/src/Memory/HPool.ixx)
set_target_properties(XoX PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "XoX")
set_target_properties(XoX PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
add_custom_command(OUTPUT output_XoX_9664B4B6
    COMMAND echo [  0%]: compiling.module.release xox
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/XoX/linux/x86_64/release/XoX/src
    COMMAND /usr/bin/gcc -m64 -x c++ -c ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/XoX/src/xox.ixx -o ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/XoX/linux/x86_64/release/XoX/src/xox.ixx.o
    VERBATIM
)
add_custom_target(target_XoX_9664B4B6
    DEPENDS output_XoX_9664B4B6
)
add_dependencies(XoX target_XoX_9664B4B6)
target_compile_options(XoX PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fmodules-ts>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fmodule-mapper=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/XoX/mapper.txt>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0>
)
set_target_properties(XoX PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(XoX PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET XoX PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(XoX PRIVATE
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/XoX/linux/x86_64/release/XoX/src/xox.ixx.o
)
target_link_options(XoX PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(XoX PRIVATE
)
